data.actual_result: Nothing is shown, it looks like a normal voice channel.
data.expected_result: The voice channel should have a lock icon because the `@everyone` role can't view it and you need certain roles/permission to view
data.short_description: Lock icon on voice channels missing when denying `View channel` permission for `@everyone`
data.steps_to_repro: - Create or have a voice channel - Deny the permission to view the channel for the `@​everyone` role - Make sure you are using the `View channel` and not the `Connect` permission - Observe the channel icon
